Module no.ntnu.mathijoh.wargame
Package no.ntnu.mathijoh.wargame.models.units

Class Unit

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.mathijoh.wargame.models.units.Unit
Direct Known Subclasses:
CavalryUnit, InfantryUnit, RangedUnit
public abstract class Unit extends Object
Base class for every Unit class.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Mathias Johansen

    • attack

      public void attack(Unit opponent, Terrain unitsTerrain, Terrain opponentsTerrains) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Calculates the damage done to the opponent and sets the health to it
      Parameters:
      opponent - the opponent getting attacked
      unitsTerrain - the terrain the unit is on
      opponentsTerrains - the terrain the opponent is on
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if opponent is null or the terrain is null
